tool_description: ### Endpoints for reviews and scores for games, movies, tv, music from https://www.metacritic.com/
name: MetacriticApi
title: MetacriticApi

api_list.name: Get game critic properties
api_list.description: Retrieve information about game and its reviews and scores

optional_parameters.name: reviews
optional_parameters.description: Defines if should include recent reviews in properties

api_list.name: Get top games
api_list.description: Receive top scoring games by platform

api_list.name: Health Check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metacriticapi.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metacriticapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://metacriticapi.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metacriticapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
